text: Achaammakkuttiyude Achaayan is a 1998 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Rajan P. Dev and starring Rajan P. Dev and Srividya in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Rajan P. Dev as Anthony Achaayan * Srividya as Achama Anthony * Jagadish as Johny * Kalabhavan Mani as Sunnichen * Jagathy Sreekumar as Lawrence * N. F. Varghese as Kozhipalli Avarachan * Devan as Dr. John Zakaria * Chippy as Mareena * Kuthiravattam Pappu as Kattapana Kuttappan * Machan Varghese * Baiju Johnson as Kozhipalli Peter * Tony * Reena as Alice Lawrence ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Achaammakkuttiyude Achaayan
